next.title: Contacts: Viewing the Program Properties of a Contact

title: Contacts: Viewing Channels of a Contact
body:
Contacts: Viewing Channels of a Contact¶

Channels keeps a record of the interactions between a program and a contact.
You may receive a message that reads “This contact has not given consent to send marketing related messages on this channel.” Refer to Managing the Consent of a Contact to change a contact’s consent.

  1. Click in the ribbon

  2. Click **CRM*

  3. Click Contacts

  4. Click a contact

  5. Click Channels

  6. Click a program to view communication interactions between the program and contact

  7. Click an interaction to view the message and status (e.g. delivered)
